Name: Video Game Tutorial
About the game: A genre-discovering game An opportunity to see popular genres from a new perspective: learn about them, try them, get a feeling of each genre on a different game level. Unless irony is not exactly your speciality. A unique gameplay Each presented genre has it’s own special feature: a unique character development system (platformer) , superordinary artificial intelligence (horror) , an original character-building system in a visual novel . Intrigued much? Different locations You find yourself in a completely different setting each level - as a part of game concept. Enjoy! And so many more things you are about to discover …
